mapper.select: select m.request_code, r.request_list_code, m.member_code,m.member_nickname,p.product_code,p.product_img, p.product_name, r.request_list_totalprice,m.request_status, r.amount, m.request_date,r.request_type,r.request_content,r.request_addr,r.request_phone from request_list r, (select product_code, product_name,product_img from product where place_code = (select place_code from place where member_code = #{member_code})) p, (select m.member_nickname, r.request_code,r.request_status, r.request_date,m.member_code from member m, request r where r.member_code = m.member_code) m where r.product_code = p.product_code and m.request_code = r.request_code order by m.request_date desc
mapper.update: update request set request_status = "정산완료" where DATE_FORMAT(request_date, "%c") = #{budget_month} and request_code in (select request_code from request_list where product_code in (select product_code from product where place_code = #{place_code})) and request_status = "완료"
